p: In addition, we examined pro-IL-1β expression to determine if increased signaling through PRRs during coinfection enhances priming signals. WT BMDMs were again infected with PR8 and S. p. alone or coinfected 3 hours apart. In samples collected 6 h, 12 h or 24 h after initial infection, we observed pro-IL-1β expression was enhanced during coinfection compared to singly infected samples ( Fig 2B and S1 Fig). Pro-IL-1β expression was due to enhanced IL-1β mRNA ( Fig 2C). In fact, mRNA levels of several cytokines were enhanced, including TNF-α, and IL-6 mRNA, in coinfected cells compared to single infected cells ( Fig 2C). Overall, coinfection enhances transcriptional activation of cytokine genes.
